casebody.data:
[No. 7780.] DOWNER V. THE PEOPLE EX REL. MAXWELL. Mr. I. B. Melville, Mr. C. C. Goodale, and Mr. Alfred Todd, for plaintiff in error. Mr. Granby Hillyer, for defendants in error.

Error to Prowers District Court. Hon. Henry Hunter, Judge. .

An actual controversy is necessary to appellate jurisdiction. The sub*498jeet matter of the controversy in a' writ of error having ceased to exist, the writ was dismissed.
